oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Jimmy Wakely Show - Audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition recording for The Jimmy Wakely Show, featuring performances by Jimmy Wakely and Polly Bergen, with announcer Cottonseed Clark. Produced by Starway Productions, Hollywood, CA. Date not present on source, obtained through research.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jimmy Wakely; Polly Bergen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Cottonseed Clark) -- She's Mine, All Mine (Jimmy Wakely) -- Jimmy Wakely talks -- I Love You So Much (It Hurts Me) (Jimmy Wakely) -- Jimmy Wakely introduces Cottonseed Clark -- Cottonseed Clark talks -- Red River Valley -- Jimmy Wakely introduces Polly Bergen -- Careless Hands (Polly Bergen, Jimmy Wakely) -- Jimmy Wakely introduces Cottonseed Clark -- Cottonseed Clark talks -- Slippin' Around (Polly Bergen, Jimmy Wakely) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Jimmy Wakely, Polly Bergen) -- Closing statement (Cottonseed Clark)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wakely, Jimmy, 1914-1982; Clark, Cottonseed; Bergen, Polly, 1930-2014
